amendment.description: To provide for cooperative agreements with tribal organizations relating to the disposal of lethal chemical agents and munitions.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1391 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1391 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Wyden. (consideration: CR S8651-8653; text: CR S8652) To provide for cooperative agreements with tribal organizations relating to the disposal of lethal chemical agents and munitions.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1391 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1391 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Wyden.
